```jsx
import { RadioGroup } from '../radio-group';

const [value, setValue] = React.useState('admin');

<RadioGroup style={{ maxWidth: 640 }} value={value} onChangeValue={setValue}>
  <RadioGroup.Item
    value="admin"
    label="Administrator"
    description="Can view API keys, add new users, change app settings, etc."
  />
  <RadioGroup.Item
    value="developer"
    label="Developer"
    description="Can view API keys, change app settings, view logs, etc."
  />
  <RadioGroup.Item
    value="support"
    label="Support"
    description="The user can view users, view repots."
  />
</RadioGroup>;
```

Disabled state

```jsx
import { RadioGroup } from '../radio-group';

const [value, setValue] = React.useState('admin');

<RadioGroup
  style={{ maxWidth: 640 }}
  disabled={true}
  value={value}
  onChangeValue={setValue}
>
  <RadioGroup.Item
    value="admin"
    label="Administrator"
    description="Can view API keys, add new users, change app settings, etc."
  />
  <RadioGroup.Item
    value="developer"
    label="Developer"
    description="Can view API keys, change app settings, view logs, etc."
  />
  <RadioGroup.Item
    value="support"
    label="Support"
    description="The user can view users, view repots."
  />
</RadioGroup>;
```
